case.state: Um, could we do this somewhere more private?
We're not going to do this with all of these people watching, right?
Sorry, I was almost late! Is the place we're going to play the game nearby?
May I take your order?
My name is Nagisa Furukawa. It's nice to meet you all!
You have such beautiful blonde hair, ~name~!
Oh no, are you lost? Maybe we could help you find where you need to be.
There's a car! Look out!
Wow! She looks so strong!
Is this lady from the historical reenactment society?
Wow, that witch cosplay is really good! Is that from a manga?
There's a hologram here, but I can't tell where it's being projected from.
(That girl is so cute!)
HI. My name is Nagisa. I go to Hikarizaka. What school are you from?
(That girl looks like she's rich. I wonder if she plays at cards a lot too.)
Welcome! It's nice to meet you, ~name~.
I guess it's not just girls from Mizuho that are invited.
Oh, wow. You look so nice. Was I suppose to wear something special? I came here straight from school...
(Oh my goodness... That lady has really big boobs. I hope she doesn't laugh at me.)
Wow! I like your wings. They look so lifelike.
Lady in black, it's okay if you want to put more on before we start.
Why is that girl already showing her panties?
I didn't think anyone would recognize me here. That's the summer uniform from Hikarizaka Private High School, right?
We... we aren't really going to play in the middle of the road, are we?!
Just kidding! It's me, Nagisa! I'm just wearing my waitress uniform from the cafe I work at. Today is a special day, after all...
Is... is this where the game is being played?
Where is Kyou? I hope she isn't late. We're about to start!
Could I please have ~cards.text~?
May I please have ~cards.text~?
I'll have ~cards.text~ if that's okay.
Can I swap ~cards.text~?
Just ~cards.text~ this time.
Could I ask for ~cards.text~?
I'd like ~cards.text~.
~Cards.text~, please.
I choose ~cards.text~ this time.
I'll trade ~cards.text~.
Could I try ~cards.text~?
Hmmm. I'll get ~cards.text~.
Would it be too much to ask for ~cards.text~?
I'd like to request ~cards.text~, please!
I'll try ~cards.text~.
~Cards.text~ for me, please.
I'll have two. Wait, um, ~cards.text~!
Oh, I have to swap ~cards.text~ of these.
Maybe ~cards.text~?
I'll keep what I have. Except for these ~cards.text~.
Could you please allow me to have ~cards.text~?
I have to try ~cards.text~.
May I have ~cards.text~?
~Cards.text~...
I'm really hoping that ~cards.text~ more will help.
Oh, ~cards.text~, I think.
Maybe I could make it with ~cards.text~?
I really need ~cards.text~.
~Cards.text~... and please be enough.
I have to trade ~cards.text~.
I have to get ~cards.text~.
Alice, that knife is making me a little nervous.
Your sailor hat is so cute, Sola! Is that your school's uniform?
I'm not ready to see a boy's private part! Please win this hand, Xander...
You can take off your amulet next if want, Zizou. Because it's either that or...
I'm sure your webmaster would understand if you took off your ribbons next, Nugi-chan...
I'm sure your Webmaster would understand if you took your ribbons off next, Nugi-chan...
Are you all wearing costumes because you're actors? I'd like to restart the drama club at my school, so I'd appreciate any tips.
I'd feel bad if I won with a big advantage, but I'm going to do my best.
I would make a terrible pirate. I could never steal someone's intellectual property.
One of us is about to lose, right?
It's nice to meet you, everyone. My name is Nagisa.
Do you like this game? I like it very, very much!
I think I have good cards. Can you check for me when we show them?
Dango, dango, dango, dango, dango, big dango family!
I think I might have the winning hand.
I think this is a good one.
Do you believe in magic and wishes, Hermione? I do. I once heard a true story about a boy who turned into a cat!
There's a famous folklore story in my town. Whenever something good happens or someone achieves true happiness, an orb of light appears.
I think that orbs of light are a symbol of happiness born from the kindness in people's hearts.
You all look really strong. If it's okay to ask, what do you do for work?
We don't need a maid at my house. I always try to help my mom with the chores.
This is better than my last hand!
I love my school very, very much! How about you, Buffy? Did you love your high school too?
Is that your school uniform, Hermione? If you're an exchange student, I'd be happy to show you around!
I'd love to meet your cousin Pearl, Mia! Does she live around here?
I think my jacket is safe!
Yeah!
I have something good!
What did everybody else get?
I think we can all have a fun game by putting down our weapons.
I'm so relieved!
This is a good hand!
I'm not worried anymore.
I wish you all the best of luck!
It's all right. I was pretty scared for a second there, though.
I'm way too old to be showing you my butt, anyway!
Yay! These are really good cards!
For a second there, I was afraid I was going to have to do... that.
I think I'm going to make if through this round. Will you be okay too, Futaba?
I just realized what I'm going to see if I win! Oh no!
Alice, that knife is making me a little nervous.
Your sailor hat is so cute, Sola! Is that your school's uniform?
Is it hard to play cards with a helmet on?
Was it hard to play cards with a helmet on?
I'd feel bad if I won with a big advantage, but I'm going to do my best.
I'm not sure if I can do this. Maybe I should try to picture everyone with their clothes on.
It's nice to meet you, everyone. My name is Nagisa.
I think I should be okay with this one.
This should be enough, I hope.
Oh, this is okay.
Two the same should be enough, shouldn't it?
I like your ribbons, Marinette. Are those new?
Mmm, it's okay.
Everything is fine.
I have a pair... of socks.
No harm in trying.
We're all doing great.
This hand is probably enough.
I guess this should be okay.
Your suit is very pretty, Marinette. I could never pull that off. I don't even look good in a swimsuit.
So... which school does everyone go to? I go to Hikarizaka High! How about you, Xander?
Well, it's something.
I wonder if maybe...
I hope I don't get another bad hand. Xander's looking at me a lot...
I have okay cards, but you guys are making me nervous.
I'm fine. Don't worry about me.
This is okay under the circumstances.
Blake, did your bow just... wiggle?
Is a pair enough?
I can't believe we're still playing when... you know...
Okay.
This would be enough to survive most rounds.
It's not like I have anything special to show, but I don't want to show it.
I don't know if this is enough.
I have a nice pair.
I think I'll be okay this hand, but what I really want is my shirt back.
I have something, at least.
This is okay, I guess.
Just because I lost my clothes doesn't mean I should give up without a fight!
My dad says I have a mysterious scar on my butt, but I don't believe him!
Alice, that knife is making me even more nervous than this hand...
Your sailor hat is so cute, Sola. I had one like that in kindergarten.
Your twintails are really pretty, Marinette.
Marinette, you remind me of my friend Mei, but all grown up!
I'm not very lucky, but at least I'm still in the game. Sorry, Marinette.
I can't concentrate. I'm so sorry, Marinette!
Sorry to bother everyone, but I think I came to the wrong game. I've... I've never been to space.
Excuse me, lady in purple... Could I ask if this is a good hand?
Maybe you're better than me at poker, Kyu. I need all the help I can get.
Thanks for cheering me up, Marinette. I have a feeling I'm going to lose this game...
I'm not very lucky. I'm sure you're doing better than me, Marinette.
But... but I was so close!
Is it true that this is the kind of poker where we have to take our clothes off?
I'm sure that everybody else has better than this.
Oh...
Ryou taught me how to play regular poker, but I was never very good at it.
I'm such a ditz sometimes.
I'd be lying if I said I wasn't a little disappointed by these cards.
I hope I don't lose my socks too...
I might lose this one...
I guess I don't know much about poker...
This is a hand that can't be beat! (I hope they're okay with me practicing my acting.)
I don't know about this...
Aw, man...
Ah... I'm starting to worry!
I should've worn my coat over my jacket.
My skirt...
Please don't freeze me, Mei. I don't want to catch a cold.
I'm sorry, but I'd better head home...
How did I get myself into this mess?
I have to keep going. This is for ~player~.
These cards are telling my fortune... and it's a bad one.
But... but I'm already down to my underwear...
I have to give it my best, no matter how hard it gets!
Someone told me that if you write the word "person" on your hand, it can help you be less nervous.
Princess, um... could you make a law against this game? Or should I have asked before you dropped your scepter?
Is it true that you can rewind time, Tracer? Maybe to about fifteen minutes ago?
I haven't felt this uneasy since I played Tomoyo After: It's a Wonderful Life.
I'm a nervous wreck. I'm trying not to worry, but I can't help it.
I know that I can leave at any time. I'm sorry, everyone, but I think I have to go home soon.
Asuna, I'm sorry to bother you, but do you know if we can get out of this game if things go badly?
I'm so nervous right now, I can even taste it.
I think I'm starting to get nervous again.
It's probably going to be you or me, Futaba. It was nice playing with you.
Kyu, if you can grant wishes, I really think I need your help!
Even the mean gun lady is doing it... Do I even have a chance?
I just want you to snatch me up and save me, ~player~.
It's Valentine's Day, but I didn't make you chocolates, ~player~... So, um, I thought I could play this game to make it up to you.
I'm nervous, and I'll probably lose, but I want you to know how much you mean to me, ~player~...
We're going to make this a memorable Valentine's Day, I promise!
I'm nervous, and I'll probably lose more than just my shoes, I want you to know how much to mean to me, ~player~...
~Player~, I know you've done so much for me, so I hope I can make today special for you.

state.text: Could you check my hand for me, Xander? I'm not sure I have anything.
Um, we, um... well, I've never actually done it myself...

case.state: You're so brave to be playing with your mom, Blake. I could never do that.
Sanako, may I ask if you know Tomoyo? She wants to be Student Council President. If we go to the same school, maybe we know some of the same people.
I really like your outfit, Angie. Is that your uniform? You're so lucky.
By the way, Elaine, what's Insult Beer Pong? Do you think I'd be good at it?
Kyu, it's okay if you want to find a skirt to put on before we go any further.
Hello. I'm Nagisa. My name can be written in one Chinese character.
Have we met before, Saki? Or do you just remind me of a girl from a manga I read?
I don't think I've seen you around school, Sanako. But you do seem familiar somehow...
Maybe we have met before, Sanako. Are you in my Music Appreciation class?
I think I worked it out! You're really pretty, Sanako, so you remind me of my mom.
I didn't tell my mom I was coming here because she'd want to come too to make sure I was safe. And that would just be weird.
Oh, Xander and I just met outside. I didn't know we were here to play the same game...
I'm sorry, Mr Prince Sir, but this game is too important. I can't just surrender!
Oh, I'm sorry! Is this a gang? Did I walk in on your gang meeting?
I've missed a few classes, so I haven't been able to make it to Music Appreciation much this year.
Would you mind if I sang the Big Dango Family song, Sanako? I wanted to share it with the whole class.
I'm sure your complete outfit looks very beautiful, Kyu. I wish we could've seen it.
I think I might have come to the wrong room. I'm not good enough to play against a princess...
Um, I didn't know that there were going to be boys playing with us too.
Um, I didn't realize that I was going to be the only girl here...
Um, I didn't know that there was going to be a boy playing with us too.
Can you let me win, ~opponent~? I promise I won't look!
Can you let me win, Xander? I promise I won't look!
You don't think I seem old enough, Streaming-chan?
Um, you're not going to put me in TV are you, Streaming-chan?
The drama club is actually closed down right now, but I'd like to restart it if I can.
"Girl on girl"? I'm not sure what that is.
What do you mean, Nugi-chan? I don't understand.
Sorry to keep you all waiting.
The least I could do is take off something small for losing.
'Kay!
Thank you guys for playing with me. I know I'm not worth much, but...
Everybody was so far ahead of me, I was beginning to feel like I was Tarou Urashima.
No cameras are allowed to be on anymore, right?
To be honest, I'm a little embarrassed.
I can take my jacket off now, I guess.
I... I'm wearing a dango bra. Please don't laugh.
I just have to imagine that we're all at the beach.
I can handle this. I'm eighteen! I'm an adult now...
Would it be okay if we played with the lights off? I'm a little shy.
Thank you for letting me win, but I don't want you to be totally uninterested...
Don't just stare. Say something!
Y-You're crazy! I'm not cute at all.
Even though it's embarrassing, I'm taking off my bra next. There are some secrets that a girl has to leave until last, Mia.
It's... it's me first?
I lost, so it's my turn, right? What do I take off? Sorry, this is my first time.
Sorry, this is a new experience for me.
No, it's okay. I don't mind taking my socks off.
I'll work harder next round to make up for this one!
I'm sorry. This was really dumb of me.
Is there any rule against holding my clothes in front of myself after I take them off?
No matter how hard things get, I vow to hang in there and never give up!
Do... do we get our clothes back at the end of the game?
I'm sorry! I've only just met you all and I'm already...
What should I do? I have to keep my panties, but if I take off my bra, I can't cover myself properly...
Oh, what should I say? I mean, I've never been in trouble before...
Ah! No fair! Who said that I had to go first?
But... nobody else...
Wait, you mean I have to play too?
I'm a complete amateur.
I was trying to follow the plan, but I keep messing it up!
Oh no, my jacket was my last piece of clothing before... y'know...
Ah!
M-me again?
Could you check again? Are you sure I lost?
It's... it's me, isn't it?
I don't want to live on this planet anymore.
Oh, the Big Dango Family? They're the best! I'd love to sing the song for you all.
Oh, right now, Streaming-chan? I'm sorry! I don't have anything prepared.
W-wait, you mean... that... with a girl? Oh, I... I...
I love the Big Dango Family because they'll always support each other no matter what!
Oh, do you love plays and performing too, Streaming-chan?
"Girl on girl"? I'm not sure what that is, Streaming-chan.
Please don't take any photos, Shego!
My friends and I are playing all kinds of games to help Tomoyo become Student Council President. I hope I'm helping.
It feels weird to do this with you guys watching.
I'm sorry that you have to see this! I know I'm not very cute...
Could you all close your eyes for about ten seconds?
I was hoping I could copy somebody else. Is it okay if I take my shoes off first?
I've never... I've never taken my skirt off in front of a stranger before...
I shouldn't be nervous. It's just us girls here.
It wouldn't be fair if I didn't join in too.
I'm going to take my shoes off.
It's okay if I start with my shoes, right?
This is kinda fun!
It feels weird to do this with you guys watching.
Doing this is a little embarrassing, actually.
Sorry, guys. Just a little nervous.
I've never... I've never taken my shirt off in front of a stranger before...
Please don't look!
Anpan!
Tonkatsu!
Please don't be disappointed...
Could you all close your eyes for about ten seconds?
M-Me?! Cute... Really?
I'd be happy to help anytime, Streaming-chan!
Um, okay, maybe I'll sing for you when I'm feeling a little braver...
I don't want to disappoint you, Streaming-chan, but I just couldn't do that!
It's just something I say to cheer myself up when I'm embarrassed. Is it weird, Asuna?
I'm fine, Hermione. Thank you for asking!
Oh my gosh, do you like the Big Dango Family too, Mia? They're so cute!
Yes, I'm wearing a bra. Underwear is for hiding a girl's secrets. My mom could teach you a lot, Zone-tan!
I'm sorry if I'm being weird, Streaming-chan... I'm trying my best.
Does anybody want to sing the Big Dango Family song with me?
Maybe I'll sing you a song when it's my turn again.
I'll have to try it later. I have to focus on my cards right now.
I... I'm not wearing a matching set. I just thought they were cute!
Kyu, would you like to wear my skirt? It's only fair because you started without one.
Did you say friends, Gwen? If you and I could be friends, that would be such a wonderful thing for me.
I don't know why I was wearing shoes in here anyway!
It's just something I say to cheer myself up when I'm embarrassed. It's weird, isn't it?
I don't normally take my shoes off outside.
I hope my socks don't get too dirty.
I can feel the breeze through my socks already!
That wasn't hard at all.
Please be nice to me.
This is my winter uniform, so of course I still have long sleeves.
I'm so glad that I got up the courage to do that!
It's going to be really hard to hold my cards like this.
When I said I'd play a game to help Tomoyo become Student Council President, I didn't know it would be this kind of game!
From here on out, I know things might be hard sometimes. But no matter what, I don't want to regret anything!
I... I'm not wearing a matching set. I just thought they were cute!
I'm sorry!
Heh he he... I'm floundering here... You say something too!
I'm sorry, but it's not polite to stare!
Instead of turning to tears, I'm turning to empowerment to win this game!
It's... your turn, ~name~.
You lost, so you have to pick something to take off... if you want.
It's okay if you don't want to take anything off. We could play normal poker instead.
I'm really sorry, but it's your turn to lose something, ~name~.
Sorry, but if you don't mind...
You really did have the worst hand?
Oh, look, ~name~ has a special hand we've never seen before that beats everything. I guess he doesn't have to take off anything, right?
You have to take something off, ~name~...
I won't look if you tell me not to.
I'll be there to support you, so please do your best!
It's fine. Actually, please don't change! I like you just the way you are.
I know how you all feel, but we shouldn't force him.
This makes me feel like a bad girl.
It's ~name~? Um, is it okay if I just face away for a minute?
Are we almost there already, or do we still have a long way to walk?
I can't say I'm unhappy...
Don't worry, ~name~. We can be happy without clothes, just like dangos!
The boys in the soccer club told me that I could do taste testing after the game. But no one brought any food, did they?

state.text: I just remembered who you are, Link! You're Zelda from that famous game! Now I just have to remember the real name of the princess.
I just remembered who you are, Link! You're Zelda from that famous game!
Are you an actor, Mettaton? Maybe we could put on a play together one day!
I'm sorry, Mr Shaggy, but you kind of frighten me.

case.state: ~Name~, you're the one that's meant to be undressing, so please stop making me feel like you're undressing me with your eyes!

state.text: ~Name~, you might be the luckiest boy in the world today. You get to play this game with three very beautiful ladies. Um, and me.

case.state: Nobody told me that boys would be playing this too.
That can just be a practice round if you want. No need to take anything off.
I'm sorry...
Oh, uh... really? Are you sure?
I'm allowed to not look, right?
We have to respect his privacy. Who else agrees?
So, let's start the next hand right away!
I'm saved!
I think girls get more embarrassed than boys about this kind of stuff.
Is everyone okay if we just stop the game and say ~name~ was the winner?
Where does this guy lead? What lies beyond?
I'll stand by watching, just as the shores watch the tide come and go.
It's your turn, ~name~!
N-No, wait for me! Don't do that!
You're so pretty, ~name~.
Sorry about what happened.
I won't ever give up!
Don't be afraid, ~name~. Everything's gonna be fine.
This is actually a big relief for me, since I haven't had a lot of luck this game.
Whatever happens, we can get through it together.
I think that it's only fair that you take something off too.
But in this world, there is someone... I wonder if she can see me.
I have to admit, I'm getting really curious.
Even when you lose, I love watching you play, ~name~. I hope that's okay.

state.text: H-hey! Shooting off another player's skirt is against the rules, isn't it?!

case.state: I didn't realize this was a maid cafe! Could I order a juice? Oh, you're not a waitress, are you...

state.text: Hello. Is your name Weiss? My name is Nagisa. I love your white dress.
I like your blue hair, Meia. You remind me of T you remind me of a boy I know.
Wait! Stop! Don't shoot!
It's your turn again, Aimee. You can put down that heavy gun if you want to.
Is there any way you could strip non-violently?
But... but all Aimee has left is...
I'm sorry you lost, Aimee, but you would have lasted longer if you just took off your clothes one at a time...
Oh no! Aiyana! You have to... you have to...
I've never met anyone like you before, BlackRose! Where are you from?
I don't know much about complicated stuff like that. Maybe my friend Kotomi might understand.
I really like blue hair like yours, Dawn!
Hermione, I know what it's like to go back to high school a year older than everyone else. But if you find the courage, you can make new friends too!
I like your hair, Jane! It's so shiny. My hair is really plain and it sticks up at the front.
Lara, you're from England, aren't you? It would be fun to visit there someday!

case.state: I think putting down the camera would be a good idea.

state.text: I like your hair, May. I should try to style mine like yours, but it always sticks up at the front...
You look really cool, Meia. Are you an astronaut?
I don't exactly agree with your line of work, but I'm sure you're still a nice person, Nugi-chan...
That's an amazing cosplay! How did you attach the extra arms like that?
I'm sorry about this, ma'am.
You really are a princess! You're just as beautiful as I would've imagined!
Please don't shoot anyone, Revy! Anything but that!
Miss Sheena Fujibayashi? Could you be related to my friends Kyou and Ryou?
Are you a real cowgirl? Wow! I normally only get to experience authentic American culture on TV!
I'm sorry that I don't play your games, Ms Trainer. My body is weak, so I can't push it too hard.

case.state: Does anyone else feel weird with a camera around?

state.text: That maid outfit looks really good on you, Nugi-chan! You should be a mascot or something!

case.state: I don't know why, but for some reason I feel like I should be really careful around you, Zoey.
You're not going to be taking any photos of me, are you?
I'd really appreciate it if you weren't holding your camera now.

state.text: Um, Princess Elena, it's okay if you want to drop out. But if you stay, I'm sure we'd all appreciate the support.

case.state: I don't think it's right to bring a camera to a game like this.
You don't really have film in that camera, do you?
You're so funny, Mahiru. I like your pretend camera.

state.text: I can't do any more exercise, Ms Trainer. I know that my body is small and weak, but... even someone like me needs chest support.

case.state: I'm sorry, Aiyana, but I have to stay in this!
Let me know when Mahiru is going to take photos so that I can turn around.
I'm sorry you lost, Aimee, but you could have won if you just took off your clothes one at a time...
I'm sorry, Aiyana. It looks like you lost too.
You're... you're not going to share your photos with anyone, right?

state.text: I'm sorry, Jura. I don't really know anything...

case.state: I feel like you'll win either way in this game, Tifa...

state.text: But... but you're basically naked already!

case.state: Mileena's turn? Can't we make an exception for girls who started in bandages?
Who lost? Was it Zoey? I can't handle this kind of suspense!

state.text: We shouldn't judge someone just for being in school uniform. Maybe she's a repeater like me.
I wonder what ~name~ looks like under that mask. She's so mysterious!

case.state: Wow, that happened in no time flat!
That was so close...
So this means that ~name~ has to take off a piece of clothing, right?
Please play too. I don't want to be alone.
Who was it that lost that round?
Um, okay.
Let us know if you're not okay with playing, ~name~.
I think I did okay. You can check my cards if you want.
Try to take off something small. Maybe a hairclip?
Does somebody have to take something off every round, even if it's a draw?
Oh.
I think I know what you're going to choose this time, ~name~.
It's okay! We'll support you!
Everybody, what do you think the least embarrassing thing ~name~ could take off?
I wish other people didn't have to lose when I win.
I'm happy that it's not me again!
Who was it that lost?
I made it through that round!
I'm not sure what to expect next.
There has to be another way...
This game is getting serious.
Us girls are just taking off clothes all over the place.
Just because I don't want it to happen to me doesn't mean I want it to happen to someone else!
It's your turn, ~name~.
For this girl who stays here all the time, this is part of nature.
That is one sensation I remember.
Well, how about it?
This part of the game doesn't feel so difficult now.
You don't have to force yourself to play if you don't want to, Corrin. How about we play a different card game?
Oh! Thank you very much.
You have to pick something to take off, ~name~...
I know you lost that round, but don't give up, all right?
Are you saying you'll take off something small, then? Oh please, you must!
Time to take off something little?
Have you decided what you're going to choose?
This was the only fair result.
You're doing so well at this game, ~name~!
I don't think I have a chance...
Was this your wish?
Isn't it nice to have people cheering for you, ~name~?

state.text: Oh, um, okay. Sorry, my heart skipped a beat when you unbuckled that.

case.state: I'm glad you chose your ~clothing~.
Your ~clothing~? 'Kay!
That was a good choice!
Aw, that's a shame. The ~clothing~ looked good on you.
Yeah, good choice!
Ha, I'm so glad!
It's your ~clothing~... I wish I still had ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ left to take off.
Much better than me...
You don't think it's too late for that now?
Are you being serious?
Did you want to born into a world like this?
If it's okay, I'd like to keep your ~clothing~ as a little memento.

state.text: "Turned on"? You're funny. We're not robots! Except maybe Mr Mettaton...
That's... that's amazing! Was that magic?!
How could I let this happen! I'm so sorry, Aiyana!
It's time for you to... um. Touch yourself. Down there.

case.state: It's time for you to... um. Touch yourself. Down here.
Don't worry. You'll feel better when it's all over.

state.text: Nugi-chan, you don't have to show us your panties yet!

case.state: Does ~name~ choose or do we?
If you wanna just play until we've all taken off our shoes, socks, and accessories, then that's okay with me!
I wonder what you're going to pick.
I haven't played this game before, so I'm watching you for tips, ~name~.
Oh, that's good.
Yep, I knew you were going to take off your ~clothing~!
~Name~, I like your ~clothing~.
Don't give up, ~name~. You're doing great!
Are you feeling as unsure as I am?
You still have something small to take off, don't you?
Of course.
I'm really surprised that you had your ~clothing~ at this stage in the game, ~name~.
But... but I'm completely exposed!
How many steps have we taken?
I never had a chance.
You did so well.

state.text: I'm sure we wouldn't have minded if you took your armbands off one at a time.

case.state: Oh, do earrings count? Does that mean I could've used my hairclips?

state.text: Oh, thank goodness! You had me so worried!
We'll be careful with your ribbon, Angie. I promise.
You are a beautiful lady, Miss Arwen. You remind me of my mom. Um, but younger! Sorry! I didn't mean to offend you! My mom looks very young for her age!
Oh my gosh, your ears! That's... so cute!
Are you an actress, Harley? If you could give me any tips on performing, I'd really appreciate it!
Um, I'm sorry if this is a weird compliment, but I really like your freckles, Piper...
Rosalina, I want to introduce you to my friend later. She loves starfish. I think you'd get along great!
I'm sorry. Normally I'm helping make orbs of light appear, not making them go away.
I'm glad you still had your belt. You worried me for a minute there!

case.state: Penny, I don't know why, but for some reason I get the feeling that you and I are very much alike!

state.text: I wish I'd thought of wearing a big belt like that.
Thanks for not taking off your armbands one at a time.
Rosalina, I want to introduce you to my friend later. She loves starfish! But Fuu-chan is definitely not old enough for this game...

case.state: That was so close, Aiyana. I'm not going to give up, and neither should you!
Oh! That's so clever, Aiyana. I wish I'd thought of that.

state.text: You look like a pretty cheerleader now, Asuna!
That looked really high-tech, Leela! I'm impressed!
Thanks for putting down the knife! That was making me really anxious.

case.state: Wow, your ~clothing~... so beautiful!
You should stop being such a meanie, ~name~!

state.text: That looked really pretty, ~name~! Did someone special give that to you?

case.state: That conforms to sportsmanship, so I think it's a great idea!
That was great, ~name~! You're the best!
Is it time for the next hand?
That's wonderful, ~name~.
I'm having fun.
I wish I could put myself in your shoes.
On to the next round!
Don't feel bad. Things can change before you know it.
Oh, is that so?
Oh, that's perfect! You look so cute!
Perfect! Thank you very much!
Good job for working so hard!
I have learned something very valuable from ~name~.
That makes a lot of sense.
I would have done the same if I were in your shoes.
Is it just me, or was that really strange?
That's not good at all! It's cheating!
How many more steps do we still have to take?
Are you hiding something?
Oh no! Don't feel that you have to start big on my account!
If it were me, I think I might be kinda sad.
I'm sorry, ~name~. I hate to trouble you with all this stuff.
I'm getting mixed feelings about this whole thing.
I know it's not much, but it still makes me a little nervous.
I don't know, ~name~. I'm sure you mean well and all, but maybe this isn't such a good idea.
Um, I'm sorry, but you shouldn't...
I was wondering at the start of the game if you were going to lose your ~clothing~.
You're doing great.
I don't want to lose, but if I win it means that you have to take off even more...
We have to hurry. Time is short.
You really encouraged me when I was losing.
I was wondering at the start of the game if you were going to lose your ~clothing~.
That's what I hoped you were going to pick.
I'm worried. I've never been to a place like this.
That's a good idea.
I'm always shy around strangers. I'm not very good at making friends, either.
I'm sorry for getting shy over something so little.
I'm worried about where this is leading.
That's not so bad, I suppose.
But I didn't expect to be in my underwear when you did...
Spare a thought for me! Um, but don't think about me too much...
I feel so conflicted!
I'm so sorry I can't do anything to help.
I want to be there to encourage you too.
What's happening?
We're allowed to leave whenever we want, right?
Oh no! What's wrong?
I don't think Florina wants to play with us anymore...
I guess Florina wasn't fast enough to get away...
You can do it, Florina!
Run for it, Florina!
I can't really blame her for wanting to run away...
Leaving now doesn't seem very fair.

state.text: Your stockings are really cute, Nugi-chan! After I finish senior year, I'd like to get a job as a waitress that gets to wear an outfit like yours.
Watch out!
I can't watch!
I really like your coat, Mei. It must keep you so warm over winter.

case.state: ~Player~ and I won't look, will we, ~player~?

state.text: A big coat like that could really keep me warm right now.

case.state: I can't watch!
Don't worry, that doesn't show too much, and you're sure to do great next time!
Don't let yourself be sad over something little like that.
So, do you have a good idea on what to take off?
Oh, your ~clothing~?
Let's keep going. We've made it this far by working together, haven't we?
It's okay. I think you're going to win this game, ~name~.
Oh, you lost, ~name~?
You still have unimportant stuff to take off.
I must admit that I am a little bit envious.
Even in a world like this, winter still comes.
Yay! Go for it!
Zoey, is it true that you kill people who have come back to life? That would probably make Mercy really sad...

state.text: Aimee, um, you can wear my shirt home if you need to. I'll be okay with just my jacket.
H-how are you doing that?!
Aimee... what are you going to wear home?
If anyone laughs at you, Buffy, than that person is just a bully!
Oh, your black stockings are so cute, Hermione!
I thought I saw the frills beneath your hem earlier. I would love to wear some too, but I don't think my school allows that as part of the uniform.
Just be careful when you lift your legs... We can almost see...
Shego... you're evil?
I'm really sorry if you didn't know what kind of game this was. You can leave if you want to.

case.state: Was... was I supposed to take my socks off too?

state.text: P-please hold back just a little...
You didn't have to take your socks off too! In this game, they're like an extra life!
B-but you're already winning! You could give us a chance...

case.state: You were holding back? Wow, I never had a chance.

state.text: That jumpsuit looks comfortable, April. I came here straight from school, so I didn't have time to change.

case.state: Elizabeth, I think of everyone here, us two are most alike. Maybe... could we be friends if that's okay?
Zoey, is it true that you kill people who have come back to life?
I'd give anything to have a little sister like you, ~name~.
I'm sure you'll do great next time, ~name~!
My mom and dad are bakers, but my dad says the only thing my mom is good at making is cream pies. If you like sweet things, you can come back to my house after the game to try one.

state.text: I hope your legs won't be too cold without those pretty stockings. Maybe we could find a place to continue the game inside?

case.state: From now on, I'll try my best to support you.
I believe in you, ~name~!
Oh, I love your ~clothing~.
Actually, I'm not sure about that. But it sure seems like you had fun!
Wasn't that nice of her? I thought it was.
You look so cute without the ~clothing~, ~name~!
Your hair is so shiny. I'm kinda jealous of you.
Be careful! That was a close one.
I think you'd make a great girlfriend. You're pretty, and caring, and smart.
I think ~name~ is doing the best she can!
We can't let that special gift of hers go to waste.
We still have a lot to do to finish the game. The real work starts now.
I don't know what I said, but if I upset you, then I wanna apologize.
What if someone sees us?
Oh, this is all my fault!
Wait! Wait!
Oh... W-Wait!
I should have thought of that. I'm sorry, ~name~.
No, I won't cry.
~Name~, you're trying to avoid following through, aren't you?
That's right! Boys should have to follow the same rules as girls!
I don't want this to be the end of our journey. I don't want to stop now.
If you think about it, it's like one player wins and gets to take something off.

state.text: A boy's underwear... This is my first time seeing it...

case.state: We're both in our underwear now, Xander. I'm still one piece ahead, but we... we can call the game a draw if you want...
It's okay, ~name~. Let's just promise not to look at each other.
Don't we need to get permission to play something like this?
I can lend you my jacket if you start getting cold.
I'm sorry. I could go away if you want me to.
I have to be honest... I don't know what to do anymore.
This is gonna take a little getting used to...
This game really makes my heart beat fast.
Sorry if this seems random, but I was just wondering if you had a girlfriend. It's okay if you don't wanna talk about it.
Everything changes eventually...
This game is so hard, isn't it?
I'm sorry if I sounded too forceful just then...
At long last, the girl's loneliness goes away.
You're doing great! Just keep doing what you're doing.
You've played a good game, ~name~. A really good game.
It's fine. We were enjoying the show.
That was so close, but I'm still nervous because Revy seems so unhappy.

state.text: Ah!
You have such a wonderful tan! I always imagine princesses being trapped in the castle all day.
Really?!
Oh!
I'm not sure if this is a good idea, but are you able to play without the halo?

case.state: You can count your cigarette if you want. I promise I won't mind!
Your belt? That's a great idea.
I'm sure if you put out that cigarette, we'd all be so happy that you could count it as a piece of clothing.
What are you going to choose next? I can only think of two things...

state.text: Are you talking about a video game? I'm sorry, but I'm no good at games.

case.state: You don't have to skip ahead just for me.
I don't know if there's a bin for your cigarette, but be sure to put it out first.
Please don't be mad with us. I'm doing even worse.
I'm sorry you have to do this, Revy, but we beat you fair and square!
The shining light brought change to a world that had ended.
Please don't be mad, Revy. At least you didn't lose like I did...

state.text: This seems to mean! I'm really sorry, Emi! You don't have to do this if you don't want to.
Something scary is happening! ~Player~, can't you do something to help her?
Even though this is immodest, at least there aren't any boys here to see us, Alice.
I'm sorry, Daisy! It's not fair that you have to take off your dress all in one go just for losing one hand.
I don't want you to lose your modesty, Alice...
Please, please stop streaming this! I'm begging you for all of us!

case.state: You seem to be having bad luck like me, ~name~.
I didn't expect you to take off your ~clothing~, ~name~.
Oh no...
You don't have to do that, ~name~! You can stop playing any time!
I'm getting nervous, you guys.
I'm always... I'm always causing you trouble...
I'm sorry about your ~clothing~.
Please don't pick your ~clothing~, ~name~. If you can think of anything else, pick that!
It's embarrassing, but you can do it!
We were going someplace, weren't we?
I'm not quite sure what to say at a time like this.

state.text: That was dangerous, Aimee... You didn't have to do it like that...
H-how did you do that?!
And your underwear is so lovely! It's just what I always imagined royalty would wear.
Wow! You had me fooled!

case.state: So you were just wearing normal clothes underneath? That's so cool!

state.text: You look really good in that swimsuit, Misty. I get tired easily, so I can't really exercise much...
My mom has a bra just like that!
An underwear party? Um, so would that mean I'd have to take off my clothes even though I'm winning?

case.state: That's a nice outfit, Marinette! I think it suits you better than the bodysuit.
You're amazing, Marinette!
Wow! That was just like a transformation sequence on TV! Except the other way around.
An underwear party? Um, so would that mean I'd have to take off my clothes but we could skip the rest of the game?

state.text: Oh, wow. Stripes.
I'm glad I'm not the only one who didn't know that this was going to happen when I picked my clothes this morning... Sorry, your highness.
You do babysitting? That's so cool! Little kids are so sweet!

case.state: That's amazing, Marinette. You're like a pro at this!
An underwear party? Um, so would that mean I'd have to take off my skirt but we could skip the rest of the game?
And your underwear is so lovely! Mine can't even compare, of course.
Huh? Wait a minute, how did you fit those clothes under your bodysuit?
An underwear party? Oh my gosh, yes! I didn't even know that was an option...

state.text: I'm just a normal girl, so I don't need fancy underwear like a princess. I would wear anything right now.

case.state: I'm playing this game with amazing people, but I won't give up!
An underwear party? Would... would that mean I could put my bra back on?
I've guess we've finally earned our stripes...
I thought we were almost even, but now it's like you're just starting...
No way! You can't just change the rules when you're losing!
Is there magic in this world?
Um, I hope you do well in the rest of the game and don't have to take off your royal underwear...
It's like you went back in time to the start of the game. I don't think it's fair to use magic to cheat like that.
I don't think that's very fair, Zoey...

state.text: Wow, your underwear is like a pretty bikini!
You look like you're ready to go swimming, Misty! That's a good idea, but I don't look that good in a swimsuit...

case.state: I know that this is embarrassing, but your pink underwear... so pretty.
Now it's really zero-suit Samus! I'm sorry, I just said that joke without thinking...
Your bra and panties match your dress! You're so stylish, Daphne...
If you disappear, could you take me with you?
I'm really shy too, ~name~, so I know how you feel. Let's support each other!
If I play my cards right, I won't have to do that too.
I feel like this is something I need to apologize for.
I'm so sorry. This game isn't fair.
You did it...
I'm so sorry if my reaction made it more difficult...
Hey, you're not staring at ~name~ and blushing, are you?
What happens if a teacher sees us here and gives us detention or something?
You did that so confidently! And there I was worried to take off my jacket.
I'm sorry. Please excuse me!
When we leave this game, we have to leave with positive feelings, not because we're running away.
Are you sure you're okay, ~name~?
You don't have to pretend like nothing is wrong.
Of course you're cute, but the Big Dango Family is a heck of a lot cuter and everyone knows it!
Maybe that was your best option...
Um, but what you're wearing underneath is very cute...
If you write the word "person" on the palm of your hand, it can help you feel less nervous!
Are you okay? It keeps getting colder.
Should I say, "Ready, set, go" or something like that?

state.text: I'm sorry if it feels like us girls are ganging up on you Xander. We're not bullies, I promise!

case.state: Don't do that!
You're going to take off your ~clothing~?
I'm not blushing. I'm just playing the game normally.
Um...
Don't you notice something weird about the girl-boy ratio in this room?
Oh, you're going to take off your ~clothing~?
Now I'm having mixed feelings all over again.
On a normal day, seeing a cute guy taking off his shirt would be the most embarrassing thing that could happen.
That body was for me. Do I just have to wish it?
Your bare chest, ~name~?

state.text: Oh, those are... I'm so confused!

case.state: And, just like he was created, the robot in turn created two friends of his own.
Your ~clothing~...
I don't go to the beach very often, so this is a big deal for me.
You remind me of a Yuusuke Yoshino poster!
Wow. That's not something I could ever do. I really admire you.
Taking your shirt off is different for a boy than a girl. This doesn't make us even!
It's nice to have company, but it's just not the same when a boy takes his shirt off!
You look... very nice.
I know that boys like looking at girls' chests, but it's not so bad the other way either.
This game has made me feel so mixed up inside.
I don't hate it or anything.
Of course, in my body of junk, I cannot feel that warmth.
I was imagining you like this a few minutes ago...
Uh-huh. No complaints from me.
Who's your daddy? You really should keep in touch with him.

state.text: Please, Fred! You don't need to solve this mystery for us!

case.state: But you mustn't do that!
~Name~, stop!
Stop it! What are you doing?!
This can't be right! Let's check the rules. Maybe you didn't lose!
That's something you're meant to keep in your ~clothing~...
I'm eighteen years old, but is that old enough to be watching this?
I'm sorry... I... I didn't mean...
Oh!
I can't wait to see what it looks like. I... I said too much!
I'm sorry if this is a silly question... but does this mean we have to get married?
I'm not sure what was harder: taking my clothes off or being here while you take off yours.
Something that will make my heart leap...
You made a commitment, so you have to honor it.
I'm really sorry, ~name~! We didn't want to embarrass you!
Just because you showed me yours doesn't mean I'll show you mine!
I know that I'm not supposed to look, but I can't stop looking!
This is my first time... seeing one of those.
I'm sorry. I was just thinking of something really naughty.
Boys and girls are so different! Um, but I can't show you.
I'm really shocked.
Is... is it true it gets bigger when a boy sees a girl he likes?
If you'd like, shall I take you to the place in town where wishes come true?
~Name~'s so easy-going, I don't think anyone can stay mad at him. He's really something.
This isn't a s-sex party, just so you know!
I never thought I'd see one of those before I was married...
A boy's... thing...
I just have to remind myself that this is normal. All boys are hiding one of these...
I feel so mixed up inside!
I'm sorry, mom and dad... I looked.
Ah, it's like a sausage! I mean, I knew, but...
Oh my gosh! I saw...
I know how babies are made, but I never saw any pictures!
I know it's hard, and I have to go.
Oh my gosh, ~name~...

state.text: Oh my gosh! I-I never imagined they could be that big! How did it fit behind your loincloth?!

case.state: It's... it's like a tentacle! I'm not ready for this!
It's so much bigger than I expected!
Even when my eyes are closed, I can't unsee that!
I'm feeling really lightheaded. Please catch me if I faint. Um, not you, ~name~...
A... a man's thing...
It's huge! Oh, I'm so sorry I said that out loud, ~name~!
Wow! I'm sorry, I couldn't hold it in...
I heard that boys get bigger when they're excited, but I never thought that it would be like this!
Don't worry about me. I just... feel a little...
Oh my gosh! How do you walk around with something that big in your underwear?!
A plaything for two? Before I was here, he was all alone. Did he dream of times like these with someone like me?
But it's so big! It's too big to fit in... a girl...
I guess the game can't end until there are eight boobies out...

state.text: Did she miss this time?
Oh no, Chell! This was so out of the blue!

case.state: Princess, it's okay if you don't want to do this!
No, that's way too much pressure!
~Name~, stop... Please...
After all that, I wouldn't blame you if you hated me.
Could you ever forgive me for this, ~name~?
You're willing to go this far for the game, ~name~?
If you'd like me to help, I can take it off while you make sure you're totally covered.
I've been a little troubled by this, but I've decided to be brave and embrace it.
Could it be possible that ~name~ is bigger than everyone?
I'm sure her hands are freezing. But, just like everything else, I can't feel them.
You know what they say: misery loves company! Ehehe...
This game might be the hardest thing I've ever had to do, but I'm happy to be playing with people like you, ~name~.
I'm so sorry, ~name~. This is all my fault!
At least can cover them easily. I'm so sorry.
It's okay, ~name~. I was just like you. You just have a bit more growing to do.
Aw, they're so cute!
Ah, you reminded me of my bath with Fu-chan!
Everyone seems to be accepting them very graciously.
Wow, that was a real surprise!
Oh, they're so pretty!
There are small things in this room, like a table and chair.
I feel like this is not something I should say out loud without regard for someone's feelings.
Thank you very much for that. They're so sweet!

state.text: You... you're not wearing a bra? But a boy can see... He can see your chest!
Oh no! You accidentally shot off two things! You need to play more carefully, Aimee!
Those... those... you aren't small, Meia. And I would never make fun of you!
Why are you taking your clothes off on purpose? This... this isn't how the game is meant to be played!

case.state: If... if you put one strap back up, maybe you could count the top half as two layers. That sounds fair, doesn't it?
Does anyone else think the game is moving too fast? We almost saw so much more...
I was hoping you were wearing a bra beneath your swimsuit...
You're doing your best. I'll support you, even if no one else will.
Moon, are you losing on purpose just to save me? Um, thank you very much!

state.text: I'm not sure if that's cheating, but I completely understand, Sayla. You can't give up without a fight, so let's do our best!
Is that a piercing? I thought only bad girls got those...

case.state: You have to play fair, Sayla. That's what everyone else is doing.
Do you think that you could ever forgive me for making you do this?
I could never do that!
I'm sorry that you had to do this because of me...
You... you actually did it!
You're so kind and pretty.
They're very pretty, and they make you even more beautiful!
They're so round and much nicer than mine...
You can use your hands like a bra, ~name~. It's embarrassing, but no one has to see.
I'm trying to tell myself that I'm just in the girls' locker-room. You can try it too if you like.
I saw two lights shining. It was only for an instant, but it felt like time had stopped.
Please don't be embarrassed. I had to touch myself in front of everybody just minutes ago.
I-I'm not staring, I swear!
Ah! I'll... I'll cover my eyes.
I can't believe what I'm seeing!
Is that how big they get in Okinawa?
Am I seeing right? They're so...
It's going to be my turn right after yours. I just know it.
Oh, wow...
I saw. I don't need to look again, do I?
They're so big! I... I'm sorry but I can't stop looking at them!
I've already shown everything, so I'm allowed to look, right?
Compared to something wonderful like these, what we're doing is just child's play.
Wow. I can see why you agreed to play. You really get to show off...
I'm no good at all. I don't have what boys want like you do, ~name~.
Wow, it's like the Big Dango Family!
If you want me to be honest, I'm a little jealous, sure.
I'm at a loss for words.
Just so nobody is disappointed, I... not every girl looks like that.
There's a world of difference. You can't even compare us.
You remind me a bit of my mom. She's really nice!
Is it strange that I'm a girl too?
For some reason, I am bothered by that girl.
Wow! I wish I could be like that.
You should look away, ~player~.

state.text: And if you didn't wear such revealing underwear, maybe you'd have a bigger target to hit...

case.state: Is that why I'm twice as embarrassed?
Maybe this is not a big deal to you, but it makes me wanna cry just thinking about it.
You're so brave...
Isn't there anything else at all you can choose?
I'm so sorry that it came to this, ~name~!
I'm not a bully at all, I promise!
But... but you only just met me a little while ago...
But... but a girl shouldn't have to...
No, you can't! You can't because...
Let's imagine that we're at a hot spring or a public bath, ~name~.
What do you want to see? A warm place full of secrets? A place where every day is fun?
Could it be that the whole purpose of this game is just to get girls out of their panties?

state.text: Hey, give those back! It's not nice to steal a girl's panties!

case.state: We get our panties back at the end of the game... right?
You can't keep those! Those panties belong to the princess!
Hang in there, Amalia! Even if you only have one life left, you can do it!
Oh no! You're so close to losing. I can't look...
You... you could still win. It's not impossible!
I was thinking you were going to win the whole game...
It's over, Amalia... We can see everything!
How can you stay so confident even though you've almost lost?
I believe in you! Either of us could still win.
Yeah! Just because a person lost all of their clothes doesn't mean they're out!
It's close to over for Amalia. We're sorry.
How are you all so brave?
I'm sorry, but I guess I get really nervous when people are naked...

state.text: Oh! It... did that just...

case.state: I... I just thought you'd be good at this game because you seem so grown up. I'm so sorry!

state.text: You can cover it, Lux! Oh, you dye your hair like my friend Sunohara? I wonder if he's got... Eep!
You can still count your glasses, Mei... Don't give up!
You could've taken off your bra instead... Now you're basically naked!

case.state: No, it's okay! It's better if your hair hangs down like that.
I'm sorry, but I guess I get really nervous when someone is naked...
You have such lovely hair that I thought... um... never mind.
Actually, if you moved your hair the other way, you could cover almost everything...
Could you please cover up? Um, down below.

state.text: It's shaped like a heart!
I really thought you were blonde! I kind of feel a little tricked...

case.state: If it's okay with everyone, I'm going to cover my eyes for the rest of the game.

state.text: You could've taken off your bra instead... That's what I did...

case.state: Of course I've never had a girlfriend! But I've never had a boyfriend either...
I have to be more like you, Jura. Confident. I can still win!
The girl was lighting the way for a moment. But when I got close, the light wasn't real.
I feel like this would have been a lot easier if I had long hair like yours.
Oh, you dye your hair like my friend Sunohara? I wonder if he's got... Eep!

state.text: I always wondered if people with red hair had it other places too...

case.state: I thought for sure that you'd have some hair... down there...
There's nothing but an empty plain stretching into an endless horizon.
You seem so grown up, but you don't have any hair down there! I've heard that some people shave it off, but... I haven't been to a hot springs in a long time...
I'm so sorry that you lost the game, ~name~!
We really didn't mean to be so cruel! Please don't be mad...
Eeep!
Oh, ~name~...
I can't believe you took them off!
You can hide it with your hands to stop everyone from seeing.
Your special place...
I'm sorry, ~name~! We all saw it!
I wish we had towels...
What is this place? What am I doing here?
I'm no expert, but I think what you have looks very nice, ~name~.
I'm a baker's daughter, but I haven't seen buns like that before!
Oh my gosh... You...
You have to touch... This is so embarrassing!
I'm sorry! I was trying to lose that round, but I won anyway!
I'm so sorry!
I think that asking a person to touch themselves is too much to ask!
I know that boys do this, but they're not supposed to show anyone!
A boy... touching... I've always...
You're... really... lucky, ~name~! B-Because you get to play cards with a sort-of-cute girl like me.
I see. So you want a friend? You must be lonely all by yourself, right?
I think that maybe I can handle this now!
You're touching...
If it helps, I'll hardly look at all.
I can't look!
This can't be happening!
It got even bigger!
Ah! Uh... ah ha. Forget about what I just said, and all that stuff.
I... I, uh... I said cute, but just sort-of-cute.
You want to go to the warm place full of secrets. That's what you've wanted all along, isn't it?
I really embarrassed myself. In return, I should at least get to see how boys do it.
Your thing...
I keep accidentally looking!
I didn't expect it to sound like that...
I don't know if there's an afterlife, but if there is, I hope it's not like this...
I don't care how cute anybody is; you shouldn't do that!
Please don't look at me like that. It's not that I don't like you, but there must be someone more suitable for you!
I... I can't believe the wing boy is doing that...
I can't believe what I'm seeing. Even the wing boy is doing it...
Oh my gosh! This is how a boy... a man...
No! Please don't touch my socks!
You don't think the boy with the wings is thinking about me, do you?
Eeek! I accidentally looked!
P-Pit... can't you use your wings to cover yourself?
It's like you're not even embarrassed!
I didn't expect it to sound like this!
Just because I'm in my bra doesn't mean it's okay to look, Pit.
Clothes are everywhere and Pit is touching his... his... I don't know where to look.
It's so hard! I didn't expect it to be so hard.
Your hands are so sticky! I can't look!
You're... you're not thinking about me, are you?
I won't stop liking you just because you had to do this!
I'm going to a special place. A place where my wishes come true. No angels are touching themselves here.
~Name~, are you pointing it at me?
I see you staring at me! You cut that out! Please?
~Name~, I'm sorry, but I can't show you my chest while you do that! Or ever.
He's so perfect, but I can't let myself look.
I can't watch!
Everyone's looking at you! I'm sorry, but I'm looking too.
I'm sorry, but ~name~ was looking right at me while he did that... Is-is he still looking?
Even if you are cute, Pit, I can't let you get any closer.
I kept working without a moment of rest.
Soon everything here will be buried in white.
I'm learning a lot. Actually, I'm learning too much!
He's... he's still touching it.
Are you okay?
Pit, sorry if this is an embarrassing question, but is it true that you have a perfect body?
My birthday is December 24. That's the night that Xander comes...
~Name~, something came out!
It squirted!
Ah! What happened?!
Ah! It shot all over my pile of clothes!
Is... is it over?
I can't believe I just saw that!
Wow! I don't think I'll ever be able to forget seeing that...
I'm really sorry. Let me know if there's anything I can do to make this up to you.
It was really touching.
I'm more grateful than anything. But it makes me feel kinda guilty too.
Is it true that a boy can ask another person to do that for him?
V-Velma... I'm so sorry!
I'm sorry you lost too, Sayla. Would you like me to find you a chair so that you can sit down?
If even a princess has to do it, what chance do I have?
If even a princess has to do it, I know I can be brave enough too!
I didn't know that this was part of the game!
You have to... In f-front of everyone? ...
You shouldn't have to do this.
~Name~, don't do it! You can't let people watch when you do something private like that!
You're not going to really do it, are you, ~name~?
I... I don't know how to make it up to you.
This penalty for losing is too much!
Oh no! If you want me to, I could stand facing you so that no one can see you touching yourself.
It's not so much that I'm lonely, really. It's just that I thought it might be more fun if there were more like me.
You don't have to be scared. We'll be with you. We can do it together, right?

state.text: You have wings?! This is turning into the weirdest day ever...
That's a personal massager. I saw one in my mom's drawer.

case.state: I'm so sorry, princess!
Oh, but then I would be really close to it, and everyone would look at my butt again...
You can still hide your private parts while you do it!
~Name~! Stop!
I can't forgive myself for letting this happen!
~Name~...
I didn't think you were going to do it!
I'm super nervous, so I can't imagine how nervous you must be!
Everybody, please consider a different penalty. Maybe ~name~ could buy us all juice instead?
Oh, but then I would be really close to it, and everyone would look at my butt...
If she hadn't met me, she wouldn't...
Just open up a little and I'm sure you can make plenty of friends.
Your hands are... This is even stranger than I expected!
This sounds so obscene!

state.text: You should be ashamed of yourself!
That won't happen to me if I lose, will it?!

case.state: ~Name~, your fingers...
This is like a bad dream!
It feels like you've been doing that forever!
You're still doing it... even though everybody can see you!
You seem to be really enjoying yourself, which is a good thing, I guess.
Is... is that what I look like when I'm in my bedroom at home?
Are you almost finished? I hope you're done real soon.
~Name~ doesn't even seem to realize where she is anymore.
I never thought of doing it like that...
I don't want people to come because of something like that!
I couldn't speak to the girl, but she was the one warm spot in this world that I had been after.
I can't really practice at home because if I raise my voice, it'll bother the neighbors.
I'm not really sure where to look.
I'm sorry.
I think love can come in different forms for different people, but please stop staring, ~name~. I just don't feel that way about girls!
Um, who are we to say that one love is more right or wrong than the other? Except, it should be with a human!
You have control over those hands, right? None of them will accidentally poke us, will they?
Someone told me I should try a "squeeze play" tonight. What am I supposed to squeeze?

state.text: Um... ah... your hair is really pretty, Chun-Li...
I'm not sure if I should say this, but that was kinda scary...

case.state: I can't lose another round!
I have renewed determination! I won't give up!
I'm so glad that's over. It looks like you are too, ~name~.
Please don't tell anybody that I was here today!
I'm sorry, ~name~. If you'd like to clean yourself up, I can give you a tissue.
I've never been more embarrassed in my entire life!
I'm so sorry! I... I was really trying to win, but I didn't think about how you would feel, ~name~.
If you ask me, you were amazingly brave! I could never do something like that.
You look relieved that it's over. I know I am!
There's no rule that says I have to be watching, is there?
What you did, that was more than enough for me.
If I add a powerful song at the climax, I'm sure it'll liven things up!
I never realized how amazing strip poker could be.
Yeah! I'm so glad you came. You were really cool over there!
I have to go first?! But everyone's watching... I wrote you a special play, ~player~. I hope I don't mess up the lines.
Oh, my heart's gonna beat out of my chest! But I have an idea for how to get through this... I have to be brave and put on my play!
It's... it's finally my turn. I wrote something special for you, ~player~. I hope you like my play.
Oh no... It might be weird, but I have an idea to get through this. I have to be brave and put on my play! Xander, please don't watch.
Oh no... It might be weird, but I have an idea to get through this. I have to be brave and put on my play!
Let me tell you a touching story about a girl who lives all alone. Nothing dies, and nothing is born in the world.
I wrote a script and memorized it so I'll know just what to say.
Under the fading sun, a sea of a tiny lights are fluttering about.
This is a world that has come to an end, an empty and still world where no one exists but I.
She puts together a bunch of odds and ends and makes a mechanical doll.
A-and then, as if answering the girl's wishes, the doll begins to come alive!
If we try hard enough, w-with time, we may be able to make something truly wonderful!
W-what is this light? I would not know a sight like this.
S-somewhere, far far away, there was another world for them to live in - one full of warmth and life.
At every turn, f-feelings of doubt still haunt her.
My long journey has finally come to an end. Ahhh! Ahhh!
My long journey has finally come to an end. Oh... omigosh...
This is really hard to say, but... I did this because I love you, ~player~...
Oh! Forget you saw anything today, please? Please, please?
I can't believe I really confessed...
I'm feeling sleepy.
Don't tell my friends that you saw me here. I'll make it up to you.
Now that I have nothing left to lose, waiting's not so hard.
I guess I'm braver than I thought.
Thank you for your support earlier, everyone. I got through somehow.
You're so brave, Futaba!
You can do it, Futaba! I believe in you.
Don't pick on Futaba. She's doing her best.
Kyu, were you... were you making fun of me during my play?
Could... could I have used my hairclips as a piece of clothing?
Is it true that I have to sit like this when I'm done? It's not true, is it?
I'm sorry if I'm being jealous, ~player~, but I don't want you looking at anyone else.
If it's not too much to ask, could we all maybe cover ourselves with our hands?
When I close my eyes, it's almost like I'm not in a room full of people with no clothes on.

state.text: I'm sorry that I won. I'd still like to be your friend if that's okay, Sanako.

case.state: I'm so sorry for winning, Alice. Here! You don't have to use your knife after all.
Sorry for winning everyone, but at least it was close, right? And I didn't even cheat by bringing cutlery.
I'm not really this good at cards. I just got lucky!
I'm so happy to have new friends like you to support me.
I can't believe I managed to win!
Even if this is where it all ends, I had so much fun playing together with you!
I saw so many things for the first time today. Um, thank you...
That was a close call, but I managed to get through the whole game with my most important clothes intact!
Could... could I have my bra back, please?
I can't believe what I just saw...
I never imagined that winning would be so embarrassing!
I'm so sorry for winning, everyone! If I just do this for a second, can we call it even?
It was almost me doing that! I'm sorry for winning, but I consider myself very lucky!
Even though I won, you all... for me... What happens now that the card game part is over?
Was this a good enough Valentine's present, ~name~? Let me know if it wasn't enough...
Miss Zone-tan, I'm sorry to bother you, but I agree with Mei. I don't think I'm ready to be in a video.
I can't believe I let a boy see me like this. No offense to your friend, Buffy, but I caught him looking at me at least three times...
No hard feelings, Dawn. Good luck with your poke-monsters game!
See? I told you you'd win, Tifa!
Miss Zone-tan... Please don't put me in any videos...
Even though this was embarrassing, thanks for making the game fun with your weird sayings, Alice.
I know you're a pirate, Elaine, but please don't plunder my booty!
I... I thought we were all going to have to do it. But I guess you don't have to do it if you won, ~player~...
I tried my best, but I'm glad it was you who won, ~player~. You're amazing.
Th-this doesn't mean you can have my hand in marriage! Does it?
How did Kyu win? She... she didn't even start with all of her clothes on.
Congratulations on winning, Meia. Just so you know, this planet has lot of less embarrassing games to play too...
I wish my doctor was as nice as you, Doctor Ziegler.
Does anyone see my panties anywhere? I don't want to have to ride the train home without them...
Congratulations, Revy. This means you're going to let us live, right?
Congratulations, Sanako. Um, please don't tell my mom and dad that you saw me here.
I'm sorry, Tina. You were very encouraging, but I don't like girls in that way...
If I had to lose to somebody, I'm glad it was you, Miss Ochako. You were shy too, but you were so brave!
Can you teach me to play cards like you, Zoey?
Congratulations, your highness! Um, would you be able to command everyone to close their eyes while I get dressed?
Congratulations! I hope I'll be the winner next time... if I ever play again.
Congratulations, ~name~. Um, if the game's over, I can face this way, right?

scene.directive: That game last night sure was crazy, right?
Um, if you could forget everything you saw, I would really appreciate it!
Oh, you will if I show you what bra I'm wearing today?
I-I'm only doing this because it's you, ~name~...
Wait, you're asking to see my panties too?
No way, buster! If you want to see those, you'll play another game with me!
Please play another game with me...
That day we met, I was so nervous.
I played so badly, and I thought that there was no way you'd be interested in a girl like me.
But even after all that, you picked me to talk to...
Our new life starts together today.
This is it. It's so sudden, but we're married now.
We can do more than hold hands tonight.
As long as I have you, I can handle anything.
